thread.section_title: Stock Market & Finance News - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: Investors Bet Against Treasurys as Bond Market Anxiety Intensifies

author: Daniel Kruger
title: Investors Bet Against Treasurys as Bond Market Anxiety Intensifies
text:
Bond investors remain on edge after last month’s big price swings across financial markets, with bearish bets on U.S. Treasury futures prices reaching a new high this month.
The latest jitters were triggered this week by Federal Reserve Chairman Jerome Powell’s congressional testimony about the prospects for rising growth and inflation, which sparked a new bout of selling that sent yields back near multiyear highs and nearly reversing three days of gains.
...
